summary: This document contains due diligence research results for Southern Trust Company, Inc. conducted by PWM BIS-RESEARCH. The findings indicate no alerts or negative media associated with the company, and it outlines the procedures for further review and compliance checks.

persons.name: Himanshu Khatwani
persons.context: Himanshu Khatwani prepared the due diligence report for Southern Trust Company, Inc.

keyFacts: The due diligence report found no alerts or negative media associated with Southern Trust Company, Inc.
The report was prepared by Himanshu Khatwani on August 21, 2018.
All searches returned no information requiring escalation or further review.
The document includes instructions for compliance and review processes.
The report is marked as confidential and for internal use only.
